# Serious Crimes
## 1. Rebellion Open participation, organization, or leadership of actions aimed at overthrowing the power of the Empire, violating its territorial integrity, or establishing alternative power, including armed uprisings, seizure of territories or management facilities.
## 2. Terrorist act/raid Demonstrative use of violence or destruction in public or significant places, committed with the aim of sowing fear, panic, or demonstrative pressure on the Empire and its population.
## 3. Grand theft Illegal appropriation of imperial, public, or strategically significant resources, valuables, or property, resulting in disruption of supply, management, security, or other key functions of the Empire.
## 4. Body destruction Murder, and then intentional destruction of the body or its distortion to a state in which the return of the deceased to life becomes impossible (similarly works in a situation where there is concealment of the body in such a way that its discovery or return becomes impossible).
